title: Unusual Package Loss
body: [My usual package loss;](http://logsoflag.com/#ndkgYXCDdoD) this game was when we used the internet as 3 people, and it was bearable, [I was the only one using the internet on this one](http://logsoflag.com/#c_ol-VEvhd_). Games are 4 hours apart from each other,I don't know what causes this sudden package loss, since only thing that changed was my friends slept and closed their computers

replies.body:
*Packet loss* typically occurs as a result of issues that happen between your PC and our servers. This could be caused by an incompatible network setting, a bad network adapter, or an issue in your network routing at a bad network hop. I strongly recommend working through our [**network configuration guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League.

Please let me know if this resolved the problem.
